title: 1.7.10 KC端崩溃

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
MC 1.7.10: net/minecraft/enchantment/EnchantmentHelper.getEnchantmentModifierDamage
Name: a => func_77508_a => getEnchantmentModifierDamage
Comment: Returns the modifier of protection enchantments on armors equipped on player.
Side: BOTH
AT: public net.minecraft.enchantment.EnchantmentHelper func_77508_a([Lnet/minecraft/item/ItemStack;Lnet/minecraft/util/DamageSource;)I # getEnchantmentModifierDamage复制代码
看样子是附魔有异常，出现了负数附魔什么的，你可以排查下玩家的装备附魔
